scope: Physical Infrastructure (Branch · Location · Department · Unit · Room · Resource)

checks.description: At least one OPD unit exists for outpatient access
checks.fixHint: Create an OPD unit type and add at least one OPD unit.

checks.description: OPD units have at least one consultation room
checks.fixHint: Add consultation rooms (type CONSULTATION) to OPD units.

checks.description: Emergency unit exists (24×7 branch)
checks.fixHint: Create an ER unit type and unit for emergency care.

checks.description: At least one examination room exists for patient assessment
checks.fixHint: Add examination rooms (type EXAMINATION) for clinical assessments.

chapters.name: Care of Patients – Bed & Ward Configuration

checks.description: IPD ward unit with active beds exists
checks.fixHint: Create a WARD unit and add BED resources.

checks.description: Branch bed count configured and matches actual beds
checks.fixHint: Set Branch.bedCount and ensure it matches the actual number of BED resources.

checks.description: ICU unit exists with beds for critical care
checks.fixHint: Create an ICU unit with bed resources for critical care patients.

checks.description: Isolation / negative-pressure rooms available for infection control
checks.fixHint: Add ISOLATION or NEGATIVE_PRESSURE rooms for infection control.

checks.description: ICU rooms have oxygen supply flagged
checks.fixHint: Enable hasOxygen on all ICU/HDU room records.

checks.description: ICU rooms have suction available
checks.fixHint: Enable hasSuction on all ICU/HDU room records.

checks.description: Nursing station rooms exist in IPD areas
checks.fixHint: Add NURSING_STATION rooms in IPD units.

checks.description: Location tree has a Campus root node
checks.fixHint: Create a CAMPUS location node as the root of the location hierarchy.

checks.description: At least one Building node exists under Campus
checks.fixHint: Add BUILDING location nodes under the Campus.

checks.description: Floor nodes exist under Buildings
checks.fixHint: Add FLOOR location nodes under each Building.

checks.description: Fire zones designated for all buildings and floors
checks.fixHint: Set the fireZone attribute on all BUILDING and FLOOR location revisions.

checks.description: At least one emergency exit marked in location tree
checks.fixHint: Mark at least one location node revision as emergencyExit = true.

checks.description: Wheelchair accessibility marked on public areas
checks.fixHint: Flag wheelchairAccess = true on accessible location nodes.

checks.description: Stretcher accessibility marked for clinical floors
checks.fixHint: Flag stretcherAccess = true on stretcher-accessible location nodes.

checks.description: All location nodes have an active revision with code and name
checks.fixHint: Ensure every location node has at least one active revision.

checks.description: Units are mapped to location nodes for wayfinding
checks.fixHint: Assign each unit to a location node via locationNodeId.

checks.description: Branch legal entity name is set
checks.fixHint: Set the legalEntityName in Branch Profile.

checks.description: Branch address is complete (address, PIN, state)
checks.fixHint: Complete all address fields in Branch Profile.

checks.description: GSTIN configured for tax compliance
checks.fixHint: Enter the GSTIN in Branch Profile.

checks.description: PAN configured for statutory compliance
checks.fixHint: Enter the PAN in Branch Profile.

checks.description: Clinical Establishment Registration number is set
checks.fixHint: Enter the registration number in Branch Profile.

checks.description: All departments have a designated head
checks.fixHint: Assign headStaffId on each department.

checks.description: At least one department is configured
checks.fixHint: Create at least one department.

checks.description: Branch infrastructure config initialized
checks.fixHint: Initialize BranchInfraConfig for this branch.
